#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
int a[1000000];
long long int t,n,k,j,sum,i,p;
	int main() {
    	while(cin>>t)
        {


    	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
        {

         cin>>a[i];
        sum=sum+a[i];
        }
    	for(i=t-1;i>=0;i--)
            cout<<a[i]<<" ";

    	cout<<endl<<sum<<endl;
sum=0;
        }
	return 0;
}
